text:
The module has logic to handle enabling buffered logs but once enabled they
can't be disabled. BufferedLogs Off is a nop.
creator: andya@apache.org

text:
Created attachment 13625
Makes BufferedLogs Off work
creator: andya@apache.org

text:
Well, it's more a documentation bug.

(1) that it's not documented at all
(2) that it's a global setting. Either all logs are buffered or all are not.
Hence turning BufferedLogs Off makes no real sense.
creator: nd@perlig.de

text: *** Bug 34463 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
creator: slive@apache.org
